# Flowforge

## Documentation Sets

- [Flowforge](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/llms-full.txt)

## Landing

- [Filament/Livewire Kanban Boards](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3): Transform any Laravel model into production-ready drag-and-drop Kanban boards. Works with Filament admin panels and standalone Livewire applications.

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/getting-started/introduction): Transform any Laravel model into production-ready drag-and-drop Kanban boards.
- [Installation](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/getting-started/installation): Get started with Flowforge in 90 seconds.
- [Upgrading](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/getting-started/upgrading): Upgrade guide for Flowforge
- [Integration Patterns](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/essentials/integration-patterns): Three ways to integrate Flowforge into your application.
- [Customization](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/essentials/customization): Customize your Kanban boards with rich content, actions, and filtering.
- [Database Schema](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/essentials/database-schema): Set up your database for drag-and-drop Kanban functionality.
- [API Reference](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/essentials/api-reference): Complete reference for Flowforge configuration methods.
- [Troubleshooting](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/essentials/troubleshooting): Common issues and solutions for Flowforge implementation.
- [Contributing](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/community/contributing): How to contribute to Flowforge
- [License](https://relaticle.github.io/flowforge/v3/community/license): MIT License terms and what it means for you
